pr_title: KAFKA-9505: Only loop over topics-to-validate in retries

timeline.bodyText: This still needs to be public: I looked at other similar objects in XXXResult in admin.
timeline.author: guozhangwang

timeline.bodyText: This added test will fail without the fix.
timeline.author: guozhangwang

replies.bodyText: nit: Can we rename to topicValidationShouldCompleteOnRetry (or something)?
replies.author: ableegoldman

timeline.bodyText: This is the actual fix: we should not loop over the global topic-map but only the remaining topics-to-validate. cc @ableegoldman
timeline.author: guozhangwang

replies.bodyText: Yikes, nice find! I'm pretty sure this is behind that C3 issue. I'm sure there's a good reason for them to race against Streams in the internal topic creation...
replies.author: ableegoldman

timeline.bodyText: I found this debug line very crucial; and in other clients (producer, consumer) the same line indicating when we actual put the request to the send queue was set at debug level as well, so I've changed it to also debug.
timeline.author: guozhangwang

timeline.bodyText: I'd have to make these constructors public in order to mock the response in the unit test
timeline.author: guozhangwang

replies.bodyText: What about making it protected instead and mock a sub-class? CreateTopicsResults is part of the public API and we might not want to make them public (would this be a public API change?)
replies.author: mjsax

replies.bodyText: Yeah that's a good idea! Let me try that out.
replies.author: guozhangwang

timeline.bodyText: Do we still need to pass in the topicsMap, as we are no longer looping it?
timeline.author: abbccdda

replies.bodyText: Yes we need the InternalTopicConfig object from it :)
replies.author: guozhangwang

replies.bodyText: More specifically we need the numberOfPartitions to compare.
replies.author: guozhangwang

timeline.bodyText: req: Can we log an error with the two topics sets (topicsMap.keySet and topicsToValidate), and then just say what happened in the exception message? Logging the entire map in the exception message will be pretty ugly
timeline.author: ableegoldman
